attributes.action: Ban use of mobile phones in schools
attributes.additional_details: To protect children in schools from exposure to inappropriate material and cyber bullying from devices being used during their school day.
attributes.background:
Ban use of mobile phones/ devices in schools during lessons, break and lunch times.  Our children are being exposed to devices with unrestricted content during their school day.

See recent BBC article
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-56663010

rejection.details:
Decisions about whether to allow students to bring mobile phones to schools, and when they can use them, is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about a particular school's policy on mobile phones you should raise these with the school directly or, if you are a student, with your parents or other guardian.
